text: Cornas is a French commune that can be found in the département of Ardèche in the region of Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes. The name is Celtic for "burnt land." It has a population of 2,082 people.http://www.insee.fr/fr/recensement/nouv_recens/resultats/repartition/comd07.htm?numdep=07&x;=39&y;=7 List of communes and population for Ardeche ==Related pages== *Communes of the Ardèche department ==References== Category:Communes in Ardèche
title: Cornas
